response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,000,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this item. We propose a price of $950,000 for this exceptional product. We believe this offer strikes a balance between fair compensation for our asset and providing you with an opportunity to secure a valuable acquisition at a competitive rate. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
